scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,server -c blue,green "npm --workspace web run dev" "npm --workspace server run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace web run build && npm --workspace server run build
scripts.prod: npm run build && concurrently -n web,server -c blue,green "PORT=3003 NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace web run start" "NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace server run start"
